data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the county of Banda who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Banda, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Banda to exponentially multiply disciples.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Banda. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Banda, Uttar Pradesh, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Jat Dhankar people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, encourage the 19,793 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Banda, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Banda. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’
